Risk Description: Integration complexity with Odoo API higher than expected
Mitigation Strategy: Start with mock data and simple endpoints; progressive integration
Contingency Plan: Use mock service if API unavailable; document limitations in deliverable

Mitigation Strategy: Test authentication early in Phase 3; use sandbox environment
Contingency Plan: Fallback to manual file upload; demonstrate concept with mockups

Risk Description: Performance issues with large datasets (185 users)
Mitigation Strategy: Implement pagination and lazy loading; optimize database queries
Contingency Plan: Reduce dataset scope for MVP; demonstrate scalability in documentation

Mitigation Strategy: Research Power BI CSV format early; validate with sample data
Contingency Plan: Provide Excel export alternative; include conversion guide in docs

Mitigation Strategy: Use mock authentication for MVP; document real SSO requirements
Contingency Plan: Implement basic username/password auth with role-based access

Mitigation Strategy: Test on Chrome/Firefox/Safari; use standard web components
Contingency Plan: Focus on one primary browser; document known limitations

Mitigation Strategy: Add 20% buffer to all estimates; track time weekly
Contingency Plan: Reduce MVP scope; focus on core features only (dashboard + 2 integrations)

Risk Description: Delays in Phase 3 impacting Phase 5 deliverables
Mitigation Strategy: Start video script and document structure early (Week 16)
Contingency Plan: Extend working hours in final weeks; parallel work on video and docs

Mitigation Strategy: Document all work; ensure knowledge sharing in weekly meetings
Contingency Plan: Redistribute tasks; reduce individual workload; extend timeline if needed

Risk Description: Video production takes longer than expected
Mitigation Strategy: Start script writing early; rehearse demos multiple times
Contingency Plan: Use simpler editing; accept shorter video (15min minimum is OK)

Mitigation Strategy: Weekly sync meetings; shared Notion workspace with clear documentation
Contingency Plan: Emergency alignment meeting; escalate to faculty advisor if needed

Risk Description: Unequal workload distribution among team members
Mitigation Strategy: Use RACI matrix; track individual contributions in Gantt
Contingency Plan: Rebalance tasks mid-project; ensure fair evaluation in individual docs

Mitigation Strategy: Daily async updates; weekly video calls; use Slack/Discord
Contingency Plan: Increase meeting frequency; use pair programming for complex tasks

Mitigation Strategy: Implement CI/CD with automated tests from day 1; track coverage
Contingency Plan: Manual testing for critical paths; document known bugs

Mitigation Strategy: Use security scanning tools (Snyk/SonarQube); follow secure coding guidelines
Contingency Plan: Document vulnerabilities; provide mitigation roadmap in deliverable

Mitigation Strategy: Use accessibility testing tools (axe/Lighthouse) during development
Contingency Plan: Focus on keyboard navigation and screen reader basics; document gaps

Mitigation Strategy: Work with legal expert; use CNIL templates; document all data processing
Contingency Plan: Minimize data collection; provide clear privacy policy and consent forms

Mitigation Strategy: Use free tiers (Vercel/Netlify/Supabase); monitor spending weekly
Contingency Plan: Downgrade services; use local development instead of cloud

Risk Description: Software license costs higher than expected
Mitigation Strategy: Use open-source alternatives; leverage student discounts
Contingency Plan: Request school licenses; use free trials strategically

Mitigation Strategy: Regular demos to faculty; validate assumptions early
Contingency Plan: Pivot based on feedback; document rationale for all decisions

Mitigation Strategy: Study grading rubrics thoroughly; align all deliverables to criteria
Contingency Plan: Request faculty review of draft documents before final submission

Mitigation Strategy: Implement error handling and retry logic; use caching
Contingency Plan: Switch to mock data for demo; explain limitation in video

Mitigation Strategy: Pin dependency versions; avoid major version upgrades mid-project
Contingency Plan: Document upgrade path; focus on stable versions (React 18/Node 18 LTS)

Mitigation Strategy: Maintain strict MVP definition; use backlog for future features
Contingency Plan: Conduct mid-project scope review; remove nice-to-have features

Mitigation Strategy: Validate requirements with stakeholders early; review weekly
Contingency Plan: Use agile approach to adapt; document changes and rationale
